= Release Todo List =

*When releasing gmock:*
 * Create an updated documentation page 
 * Tag the release
 * Upload the artifact to the Sonatype OOS repository
 * Release the artifact on Sonatype OOS
 * Make the artifacts available on google code
 * Update the download page
 * Update google code site
 * Increment the current version
 * Announce it
